price: ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߓߘߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߝߋ߲߫ ߛߌߦߊߡߊ߲߫ ߠߊߝߟߌ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߞߟߋ߫ ، ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߴߏ߬ ߤߊߞߟߌߡߦߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
